metadata.dc:author: Caballero Carpena, O
metadata.dc:description: The author writes about some facts related to the use of 99m-Tc-phosphate in skeletal scanning, specially to recognize cancer metastases, and vascular and inflammatory osseous diseases, and indicates some conditions to carry out the study.
metadata.dc:title: La medicina nuclear en la patolog√≠a osteoarticular.
[Nuclear medicine in osteoarticular pathology].
